product_name: Black Diamond Soloist Insulated Gloves - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Black Diamond Soloist Insulated Gloves have removable liners and are designed for harsh alpine environments where warmth and dexterity are crucial. 100% waterproof BDry inserts stay with the removable liners. Lightweight, abrasion-resistant, woven nylon shells have 4-way stretch for comfort and great dexterity. 142g PrimaLoft(R) One insulation keeps your hands warm on cold winter days. 133g PrimaLoft One needlepunch insulation in the palms allows for maximum dexterity and minimal bulk. Black Diamond Soloist Insulated Gloves have goat leather palms plus palm patches with Kevlar stitching to provide good grip. Closeout.
short_description: Black Diamond Soloist Insulated Gloves have removable liners and are designed for harsh alpine environments where warmth and dexterity are crucial.
